item.title: WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls: Know More - News18
item.description:
WhatsApp Will Soon Get A Dialer On iPhones To Make It Easy For Calls

Date: December 16, 2024 Source: News18

WhatsApp is enhancing its app for iPhone users by introducing a dialer tab, aimed at consolidating messaging and calling functions within the app, allowing users to make calls directly from it.

  • WhatsApp will introduce a dialer tab for iPhone users.
  • This feature allows users to call others without leaving the WhatsApp app.
  • The dialer will open when clicking the + icon on the WhatsApp feed.
  • The feature is also aimed to enhance the app's integration for users, as available on Android.
  • WhatsApp will limit calls to the app's ecosystem, potentially creating issues in regions heavily reliant on traditional calling.
  • Recent updates have improved video call quality and group calling functionalities.
“Having its own dialer app means WhatsApp users don’t need to rely on the default dialer that is provided by Google and Apple.”

This new dialer feature aims to provide a more integrated experience for WhatsApp users on iPhones, though it may have limitations in markets where traditional phones dominate.

item.title: ChatGPT’s AI search engine is rolling out to everyone - The Verge
item.description:
ChatGPT’s AI Search Engine Now Available to All Users

Publication Date: October 31, 2024 Source: The Verge

OpenAI has officially rolled out ChatGPT’s AI search engine to all users, enhancing its capabilities and making it accessible to free tier accounts.

  • ChatGPT’s search engine was initially available only to paid subscribers.
  • The mobile version has been optimized to resemble traditional search engines, providing lists of results with images and ratings.
  • New fast search options allow quicker access to specific types of sites.
  • Advanced Voice Mode now delivers real-time web information for paid users.
“ChatGPT will display a list of results with accompanying images, ratings, and hours for local searches.”

This expansion marks a significant step for OpenAI in making AI-driven search more accessible and user-friendly.

item.title: ChatGPT search is now available to all free users - Search Engine Land
item.description:
ChatGPT Search Now Available to All Free Users

Publication Date: Today | Source: OpenAI Announcement

OpenAI has announced that all free, logged-in ChatGPT users can now access ChatGPT search globally across all platforms.

  • This feature was previously available only to paid subscribers.
  • Kevin Weil, OpenAI’s Chief Product Officer, expressed enthusiasm for the updated search capability.
  • The expansion of ChatGPT search may begin to shift some search market share away from Google.
  • OpenAI is also enhancing mobile experiences and introducing new search capabilities, including voice mode.
“I can’t imagine ChatGPT without Search now. I use it so often.” - Kevin Weil

The launch of ChatGPT search as a free feature could significantly widen its user base, promoting a notable shift in user behavior and market dynamics.

item.title: Windows Users Can Finally Share Files With iPhones: All Details - News18
item.description:
Windows Users Can Finally Share Files With iPhones: All Details

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 19:49 IST

Microsoft has introduced a major update to its file-sharing capabilities, making it easier than ever for iPhone users to share files with their Windows desktops or laptops. By leveraging Phone Link and Link to Windows apps, the tech giant is bridging the gap between iPhones and PCs, facilitating smoother collaboration between the two platforms.

  • The Phone Link app now supports file transfers between iPhones and Windows PCs.
  • This feature is currently available only to Windows Insiders with plans for a broader rollout.
  • Users must have compatible versions of iOS and the Windows Phone Link app to share files.
  • File sharing can be done by selecting the “Link to Windows” option.
  • The feature is still in testing, with feedback being collected via the Feedback Hub.
“Windows and iOS devices have never got along well but things could be changing with the new update.”

This update highlights Microsoft's commitment to enhancing interoperability between devices and improving user experience in file sharing.

item.title: Google Introduces Veo and Imagen 3 for Advanced Media Generation on Vertex AI - InfoQ.com
item.description:
Google Introduces Veo and Imagen 3 for Advanced Media Generation on Vertex AI

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Google Cloud Blog

Google Cloud has introduced Veo and Imagen 3, two new generative AI models available on its Vertex AI platform. Veo generates high-definition videos from text or image prompts, while Imagen 3 creates detailed, lifelike images.

  • Veo is Google DeepMind’s most advanced video generation model, creating high-definition videos that maintain realism and consistency.
  • Imagen 3 delivers high-quality image generation with fewer visual artifacts and includes editing and customization capabilities.
  • Both models support safety measures, including digital watermarking and data governance.
  • Companies like WPP and Agoda are already testing these models for marketing applications.

This is a huge step forward! With Google’s Veo and Imagen 3, the possibilities for video and image generation are expanding rapidly.

For businesses interested in using Veo, they can contact their Google Cloud representative for access.

item.title: Cheaper 5G smartphones ramp up volumes - The Economic Times
item.description:
Cheaper 5G Smartphones Ramp Up Volumes

Publication Date: [Publication Date Not Available] Source: [Source Not Available]

5G smartphone prices are declining, leading to increased sales volumes in India. Despite a fall in average selling prices, the market is witnessing a surge in the demand for affordable 5G devices.

  • Prices of 5G smartphones have declined by 20% year-on-year.
  • 37 million 5G smartphones were shipped in the September quarter, with their market share rising to 83% from 57% a year ago.
  • New affordable 5G models priced between Rs 10,000 and Rs 20,000 are driving consumer interest.
  • A significant increase in the market share during the festive season coincides with the doubling of 5G handsets in the $100-200 mass segment.
  • Forecasts suggest even lower prices with upcoming sub-Rs 10,000 models expected in 2025.
“Beyond the pandemic replacement cycle, the ultra-low-end 5G push to remain critical for the market’s organic growth in 2025.” - Sanyam Chaurasia, Canalys analyst

The shift toward affordable 5G smartphones appears to reshape consumer behaviors dramatically, signaling potential for future growth in this segment.

item.title: Apple Announces Best iPhone Apps And Games of 2024: Full List Here - News18
item.description:
Apple Announces Best iPhone Apps And Games of 2024: Full List Here

Date: December 16, 2024
Source: News18

Apple has unveiled the winners of the 2024 App Store Awards, highlighting exceptional apps and games across various categories recognized for their design and innovation.

  • iPhone App of the Year: Kino (LUX Optics Inc.) - A video camera app with film features.
  • iPad App of the Year: Moises (Moises Systems Inc.) - An AI app for musicians with audio features.
  • Mac App of the Year: Adobe Lightroom (Adobe Inc.) - A photo editing tool with effective search capabilities.
  • Apple Vision Pro App of the Year: What If…? – An Immersive Story (Disney) - A storytelling app with graphical experiences.
  • Apple Watch App of the Year: Lumy (Raja V) - A sun exposure tracking app.
  • Apple TV App of the Year: F1 TV (Formula One Digital Media Limited) - Offers live races and highlights for F1 fans.
  • iPhone Game of the Year: AFK Journey (Farlight Games) - A tactical adventure game.
  • iPad Game of the Year: Squad Busters (Supercell) - A multiplayer logistical strategy game.
  • Mac Game of the Year: Thank Goodness You’re Here! (Panic, Inc.) - An absurd adventure game.
  • Apple Vision Pro Game of the Year: THRASHER: Arcade Odyssey (Puddle, LLC) - An engaging arcade game.
  • Apple Arcade Game of the Year: Balatro+ (Playstack Ltd.) - A strategic card game.

Cultural Impact Winners: Oko, EF Hello, Daily Art, NYT Games, The Wreck, Do You Really Want To Know? 2.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: One UI 7 changes refresh rate settings for games - GSMArena.com
item.description:
One UI 7 Introduces New Refresh Rate Settings for Games

Publication Date: N/A Source: SamMobile

Samsung has released the second beta of One UI 7, introducing a new feature that allows users to change refresh rate settings for games. Users can now select between 60 Hz and 120 Hz for a smoother gaming experience.

  • The previous One UI version limited game frame rates to 48 Hz for power saving.
  • New settings are accessible in the Gaming Hub / Game Booster app under "Gaming motion smoothness".
  • Games with their own refresh rate settings will not be affected.
  • Performance settings can also be adjusted individually per game, including maximum frame rate and resolution.
“This feature won't affect games that have their own refresh rate setting.”

In conclusion, One UI 7 enhances gaming customization, offering users greater control over their gaming experience.

item.title: Meta adds live translation, AI video to Ray-Ban smart glasses By Reuters - Investing.com
item.description:
Meta Adds Live Translation, AI Video to Ray-Ban Smart Glasses

Publication Date: Monday, Date Unknown

Source: Reuters

The latest update to the Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses features AI video capabilities and real-time language translation, announced by Meta Platforms.

  • The update, part of the v11 software, is available to users in the 'Early Access Program'.
  • The glasses can now translate speech in real-time between English, Spanish, French, and Italian.
  • The AI video feature allows the glasses to process visual input and provide responses based on what the user sees.
  • The integration of the Shazam app enables users to identify songs directly through their smart glasses.
“When you're talking to someone speaking one of those three languages, you'll hear what they say in English through the glasses' open-ear speakers or viewed as transcripts on your phone, and vice versa,” Meta said in a blog.

This update marks a significant enhancement in the functionality of smart glasses, paving the way for more versatile and user-friendly devices.

item.title: OpenAI 2024 event: How to watch new ChatGPT product reveals and demos - TechCrunch
item.description:
OpenAI 2024 event: How to watch new ChatGPT product reveals and demos

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: TechCrunch

OpenAI is gearing up for its holiday event, “12 Days of OpenAI,” featuring daily product reveals streamed live on YouTube at 10 AM PT through December 23. The event showcases several exciting announcements, including the launch of ChatGPT Pro, a new subscription plan, and various innovative features such as a text-to-video generator and real-time video capabilities.

  • OpenAI is hosting “12 Days of OpenAI,” a series of daily live streams.
  • Key reveals include ChatGPT Pro subscription for $200/month and new AI features.
  • Live streaming will occur on YouTube with past streams available for catch-up.
“OpenAI will stream the event live on its YouTube channel.”

This event represents a significant moment for OpenAI as it rolls out new technology and engages with its audience.

item.title: Google DeepMind unveils a new video model to rival Sora - TechCrunch
item.description:
Google DeepMind Unveils Next-Gen Video Model Veo 2 to Compete with Sora

Publication Date: Unknown

Source: TechCrunch

Google DeepMind has announced Veo 2, a powerful new video-generating AI aimed to outperform OpenAI's Sora, featuring enhanced resolution and extended video length capabilities.

  • Veo 2 can create videos over two minutes long at resolutions up to 4k.
  • Currently available in Google's VideoFX tool, it can generate videos up to 720p and eight seconds long.
  • Veo 2 boasts improvements in understanding physics, camera controls, and generating sharper images, especially with motion.
  • DeepMind aims to refine Veo 2 through feedback from users and collaboration with creative professionals.
  • The company addresses risks associated with generative AI by using watermarking technology and implementing content filters.
“Over the coming months, we’ll continue to iterate based on feedback from users,” said Eli Collins, VP of product at DeepMind.

In conclusion, Veo 2 represents a significant step forward in AI-driven video generation, setting the stage for competitive innovation in the field.

item.title: Google aims to boost productivity with AI Agent tool - TechTarget
item.description:
Google Aims to Boost Productivity with AI Agent Tool

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: TechTarget

Google has unveiled a new tool called Google Agentspace, designed to use AI agents and search technology to improve employee productivity by simplifying document searches.

  • Google Agentspace helps users accomplish complex tasks requiring planning, research, and content generation.
  • The tool integrates with Google's NotebookLM, enhancing the way employees interact with information.
  • It provides a unified search platform to minimize time spent searching for internal documents.
  • Challenges include training employees on effective use and handling responsible AI concerns.

"Agents need better memory, which is the ability to remember things and contextualize the responses." - Arun Chandrasekaran, Analyst at Gartner

Google's introduction of Agentspace marks a significant step in enhancing workplace efficiency through advanced AI tools.

item.title: Tech News Today Live Updates on December 16, 2024: A year of life-saving moments: How Apple Watch became a critical emergency tool in 2024 | Mint - Mint
item.description:
How Apple Watch Became a Life-Saving Emergency Tool in 2024

Publication Date: 16 Dec 2024 Source: LiveMint

In 2024, the Apple Watch proved to be an essential tool for emergency situations, assisting in life-threatening incidents and revolutionizing healthcare technology.

  • The device's fall detection and heart health alerts have saved lives globally.
  • Wearable technology's transformative potential in healthcare is highlighted.
“The Apple Watch has showcased its capability beyond mere fitness tracking, becoming a critical ally in emergencies.”

This development marks a significant step in how technology can positively impact health outcomes, reinforcing the importance of innovation in wearable devices.

item.title: Wearables to Face Continued Growth While Giving Way to New Form Factors, According to IDC - IDC
item.description:
Wearables to Face Continued Growth While Giving Way to New Form Factors, According to IDC

Date: December 16, 2024
Source: IDC

Global shipments for wearables are expected to grow by 6.1% in 2024, reaching 538 million units, although growth rates will slow in coming years as key markets mature.

  • Wearable shipments predicted to grow 6.1% in 2024 but slow to 3.9% in 2025.
  • Smartwatches expected to decline by 4.5% in 2024 due to market saturation.
  • Hearables to grow by 10.3% as new designs and pricing strategies boost demand.
  • Emerging categories like smart rings and display-less smart glasses gaining attention.
“With growth slowing in smartwatches, some vendors are turning to rings as alternative or complementary health trackers.” - Jitesh Ubrani, IDC

This analysis highlights a transitional period for the wearables market, signaling crucial opportunities for innovation in emerging categories beyond traditional smartwatches.

item.title: Temu is the most-downloaded app on the U.S. App Store in 2024 - TechCrunch
item.description:
Temu is the most downloaded app on the US App Store in 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: TechCrunch

Chinese shopping app Temu has reclaimed its title as the most downloaded free app in the U.S. according to Apple’s annual list.

  • Temu moved into the No. 1 position in 2023, surpassing TikTok.
  • In this year's ranking, TikTok dropped to No. 3 behind Meta’s Instagram Threads which is at No. 2.
  • ChatGPT ranked fourth after making its iPhone debut in May 2023.
  • Meta’s presence is noted, with Threads doing well but Instagram and WhatsApp down to No. 6 and 7.
  • The top free game was Block Blast!, followed by Monopoly Go! and Roblox.
“It’s also the only year-end list from Apple where ChatGPT makes an appearance.”

In conclusion, Temu’s success reflects a shift in consumer preferences for shopping apps, while other apps like ChatGPT and Threads gain ground.

item.title: Most iPhone owners see little to no value in Apple Intelligence so far - 9to5Mac
item.description:
Most iPhone Owners See Little to No Value in Apple Intelligence So Far

Publication Date: December 12, 2024 | Source: 9to5Mac

A new survey reveals that while iPhone buyers consider AI important, most find the current Apple Intelligence features lacking in value. Future updates like Genmoji and ChatGPT integration may change perceptions.

Key Points

  • Interest in AI features is high among iPhone users, with 47.6% rating them as important when purchasing a new phone.
  • In contrast, only 23.7% of Samsung users rated AI features as significant.
  • 73% of Apple Intelligence users find current features to be not very valuable.
  • Most popular Apple Intelligence features prior to iOS 18.2 launch include Writing Tools (72%) and Notification Summaries (54%).
  • Upcoming features like Genmoji and ChatGPT integration may provide new functionality that enhances user experience.
“Smartphone users in general are unsatisfied with the existing AI features…”

Overall, while there is interest in AI among users, the initial offerings from Apple have not impressed many, creating anticipation for future updates to meet these expectations.

item.description:
Sony Bravia TV Days on Amazon: Get the best TVs with awesome discounts for a limited time

Publication Date: 16 Dec, 2024

Source: LiveMint

In an era dominated by rapid technological evolution, staying informed with the latest technology news is essential. This segment offers a comprehensive look at the newest advancements and breakthroughs shaping our world.

  • Sony Bravia TV Days on Amazon feature exclusive discounts on top-notch 4K Ultra HD TVs.
  • Limited-time offers while stocks last on various Sony Bravia models.
  • Focus on enhancing home entertainment setups with cutting-edge technology.
"Hurry, these limited-time deals won’t last long!"

The Sony Bravia TV Days are an excellent opportunity for consumers to upgrade their home entertainment systems with premium technology at reduced prices.
